script.name: Lib.Cmd.Anarkis.ADS.Long.Range.Combat
script.description: Ship control task running at a higher priority. Scope: launching multiple missiles simultaneusly to weaken the target from a distance before engaging in close range combat

line.comment: * LU Update (Solarahawk): disabled MDM code
* Initiate waiting time until fire permission is given
* Set turrets capable of firing missiles on bombers to do nothing, to prevent missile shots in launch sequence
* Wait untill undocking
* Wait untill fully undocked
* Wait another period untill fighter has left close range area around carrier

line.text: '%sWaiting phase ended, starting missile control. Bomber: %s'

line.comment: * Get bomb mission params
*$mdm = [THIS]-> call script 'anarkis.ads.check.mdm.active' :
* End this script, if no missiles are available for combat
* Search for missile with highest range
* No dumbfire missiles allowed
* No boarding pods allowed, as well as any MDM used missiles, as they should rather be used as missile countermeasure
*if $mdm == [TRUE]
*do if $missile == {Boarding Pod} OR $missile == {Chaff} OR $missile == {Poltergeist Missile}
*continue
* No boarding pods allowed
*else
*end
* End this script, if no suitable missile has been found
* Enter waiting mode, if THIS has currently no target, or wing is no longer existent, or target is no enemy
* If ship does not have a enemy ship in crosshairs, check, if it has a enemy ship stored
* Search for some other missile type, if THIS runs out of missiles
* Check distance to target
* Relax at 150%+ missile range away from target
* Pay attention between 150% and 110% missile range
* Enter ready mode between 110% and 80% missile range
* Stop shooting with missiles at target when getting close (too many missiles lost through friendly fire in hot areas)
* Get or calculate target strength, store strength as a local on target
* Shoot missile only if strength points have not yet reached zero, else wait a bit; when target is 'fed up' with missiles, set fire missile probability to zero, to not waste any missiles
* Wait here for fire permission
* Set bomber missile fire time difference to 1ms
* F I R E ! Begin lauching missiles at target when reaching less than 80% missile range
* Shoot missile only if strength points have not yet reached zero, else wait a bit

line.text: '%sMissiles in cargo bay before shot: %s after shot: %s'

line.comment: * If THIS has no turret capable of firing missiles, simply fire a missile with main turret
* Iinciate waiting time untill fire permission is given
* Reset fire missile time difference to original value
* If THIS is a bomber AND missile empty, return it home (makes no sense for bombers to fly around with no missiles aboard)

line.text: '%s BOMBER is advised to leave wing %s and return home'

line.comment: * Stop hullcheck
* Begin returning home
* Terminate any running permission script

sval.val: Ship control task running at a higher priority. Scope: launching multiple missiles simultaneusly to weaken the target from a distance before engaging in close range combat
Ads.long.range.combat @
%sWaiting phase ended, starting missile control. Bomber: %s
%sCompatible missiles found in cargo bay: %s
%sTarget: %s Wing exists: %s Target enemy: %s
%sDistance to target: %s Combat range: %s
%sTarget: %s, strength: %s, class: %s
%sDelay untill reaching fire permission: %ss
%sTarget: %s, strength: %s
%sMissiles in cargo bay before shot: %s after shot: %s
%sFired missile %s (damage: %s) on %s (strength: %s)
%sMISSILE EMPTY!
%s BOMBER is advised to leave wing %s and return home
%sBegins task anarkis.acc.guide.home on task nr. %s
LU Update (Solarahawk): disabled MDM code
Initiate waiting time until fire permission is given
Set turrets capable of firing missiles on bombers to do nothing, to prevent missile shots in launch sequence
Wait untill undocking
Wait untill fully undocked
Wait another period untill fighter has left close range area around carrier
Get bomb mission params
$mdm = [THIS]-> call script 'anarkis.ads.check.mdm.active' :
End this script, if no missiles are available for combat
Search for missile with highest range
No dumbfire missiles allowed
No boarding pods allowed, as well as any MDM used missiles, as they should rather be used as missile countermeasure
if $mdm == [TRUE]
do if $missile == {Boarding Pod} OR $missile == {Chaff} OR $missile == {Poltergeist Missile}
No boarding pods allowed
End this script, if no suitable missile has been found
Enter waiting mode, if THIS has currently no target, or wing is no longer existent, or target is no enemy
If ship does not have a enemy ship in crosshairs, check, if it has a enemy ship stored
Search for some other missile type, if THIS runs out of missiles
Check distance to target
Relax at 150%+ missile range away from target
Pay attention between 150% and 110% missile range
Enter ready mode between 110% and 80% missile range
Stop shooting with missiles at target when getting close (too many missiles lost through friendly fire in hot areas)
Get or calculate target strength, store strength as a local on target
Shoot missile only if strength points have not yet reached zero, else wait a bit; when target is 'fed up' with missiles, set fire missile probability to zero, to not waste any missiles
Wait here for fire permission
Set bomber missile fire time difference to 1ms
F I R E ! Begin lauching missiles at target when reaching less than 80% missile range
Shoot missile only if strength points have not yet reached zero, else wait a bit
If THIS has no turret capable of firing missiles, simply fire a missile with main turret
Iinciate waiting time untill fire permission is given
Reset fire missile time difference to original value
If THIS is a bomber AND missile empty, return it home (makes no sense for bombers to fly around with no missiles aboard)
Stop hullcheck
Begin returning home
Terminate any running permission script
